data.prayer: Father, bring yourself glory in Al Buraymi. Through your servants plant 23 new churches that love you, love one another, and make disciples this year.
data.verse: For the earth will be filled with the knowledge of the glory of the LORD as the waters cover the sea.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Al Buraymi, Oman
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Spirit, guide seekers in Al Buraymi, Oman to the gospel through searching YouTube or TikTok today.
data.verse: I love those who love me, and those who seek me find me.

data.prayer: Over 97.15 percent of the people of Al Buraymi are far from Jesus. Lord, please send your gospel to them through the internet or radio or television today!

Spirit, build the strength and maturity of the local leaders in Al Buraymi, Oman. Show them that faithfulness is more important than knowledge. Show them that the Spirit, the Word, and prayer is enough in order to grow and lead.

Jesus, I pray that all the Baloch, Southern people will remember and turn to you, Lord God. May all the Baloch, Southern people worship before you. For the kingdom of the Baloch, Southern people is yours.
Father, help your children in Al Buraymi, Oman find someone like the Samaritan Woman today. Someone who will open an entire town to your message of salvation.
data.verse: So the woman left her water jar and went away into town and said to the people, 29 “Come, see a man who told me all that I ever did. Can this be the Christ?” They went out of the town and were coming to him.

data.prayer: Father, please send new evangelists into the harvest in the state of Al Buraymi, Oman.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.section_summary:
the state of Al Buraymi, Oman has a population of 115,000.

We estimate Al Buraymi has 751 people who might know Jesus, 2,524 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 111,725 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 153 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, thank you that you will never abandon the church of Al Buraymi, Oman.
data.verse: Be free from the love of money, content with such things as you have, for he has said, “I will in no way leave you, neither will I in any way forsake you.
